comments.body: Ok, so we are now using this kind of formatting for local variables?
Yeah, annotation right before the type (see checkstyle changes for why that's needed)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +109,113 @@        <setting id="org.eclipse.jdt.core.formatter.insert_new_line_after_annotation_on_enum_constant" value="insert"/>
        <setting id="org.eclipse.jdt.core.formatter.insert_new_line_after_annotation_on_field" value="insert"/>
        <setting id="org.eclipse.jdt.core.formatter.insert_new_line_after_annotation_on_local_variable" value="do not insert"/>
        <setting id="org.eclipse.jdt.core.formatter.insert_new_line_after_annotation_on_method" value="insert"/>
        <setting id="org.eclipse.jdt.core.formatter.insert_new_line_after_annotation_on_package" value="insert"/>
